snippet: Martin Marietta Materials said on Monday that it would appeal a Delaware judge's ruling that put its proxy challenge and $4.8 billion hostile bid for Vulcan Materials on hold for four months.
abstract: Martin Marietta Materials said on Monday that it would appeal a Delaware judge's ruling that put its proxy challenge and $4.8 billion hostile bid for Vulcan Materials on hold for four months.

headline.main: Martin Marietta to Appeal Vulcan Ruling
